item.title: Report X-2024090688
item.description:
Report X-2024090688

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-05
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On September 4th during the PM sort a drum was found that had a small leak. The drum contained UN3082 Environmentally Hazardous Substance, liquid, n.o.s.(), 9, PGIII. The spill was contained and the package was placed into a salvage drum and is awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report E-2024090313
item.description:
Report E-2024090313

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-18T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-16
  • City: CARLSTADT
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2-ounces of Shop-Line J95 Basemaker was released from a 1-gallon metal pail due to improper loading by terminal personnel. The release impacted trailer #3173268. The spill had already been cleaned up prior to being reported.
